entry.name: AcquisitionDate
entry.description: A number identifying the single continuous gathering of data over a period of time which resulted in this image

entry.name: ContentDate
entry.description: The date the image data creation started. Required if image is part of a series in which the images are temporally related

entry.name: AcquisitionTime
entry.description: The time the acquisition of data that resulted in this image started

entry.name: ContentTime
entry.description: The time the image pixrl data creation started. Required if image is part of a series in which the images are temporally related

entry.name: Acquisition Datetime
entry.description: The date and time that the acquisition of dada that result in this image started

entry.name: DerivationDescription
entry.description: A text description of how this image was derived

entry.name: AcquisitionNumber
entry.description: Image identification characteristics

entry.name: InstanceNumber
entry.description: A number that identifies this image

entry.name: ImageComments
entry.description: User-defined comments about the image

entry.name: ImageInAcquisition
entry.description: Number of images that resulted from this acquisition of data

entry.name: >Referenced SOP Class UID
entry.description: Uniquely identifies the referenced SOP Class

entry.name: >Referenced SOP Instance UID
entry.description: Uniquely identifies the referenced SOP Instance

entry.name: > Referenced Frame Number
entry.description: References one or more image frames of a Multi-frame Image SOP Instance, identifying which frames are significantly related to this image

entry.name: >Referenced SOP Class UID
entry.description: Uniquely identifies the referenced SOP Class

entry.name: >Referenced SOP Instance UID
entry.description: Uniquely identifies the referenced SOP Instance

entry.name: > Referenced Frame Number
entry.description: References one or more image frames of a Multi-frame Image SOP Instance, identifying which frames are significantly related to this image

entry.name: ImageType
entry.description: Image identification characteristics

entry.name: Lossy Image Compression
entry.description: Specifies whether an image has undergone lossy compression. Enumerated values: 00 = image has not been subjected to lossy compression. 01 = image has been subjected to lossy compression

entry.name: Quality Control Image
entry.description: Indicates whether or not this image is a quality control or phantom image. Enumerated values: YES, NO

entry.name: PatientOrientation
entry.description: Patient direction of the rows and columns of the image. Not required for MR images

entry.name: ImageType
entry.description: Image identification characteristics

entry.name: Samples per Pixel
entry.description: Number of samples (planes) in this image

entry.name: PhotometricInterpretation
entry.description: Specifies the intended interpretation of the pixel data

entry.name: BitsAllocated
entry.description: Number of bits allocated for each pixel sample. Each sample shall have the same number of bits allocated

entry.name: Scanning Sequence
entry.description: Description of the type of data taken. Enumerated values: SE = Spin Echo; IR = Inversion Recovery; GR = Gradient Recalled; EP = Echo Planar; RM = Research Mode

entry.name: SequenceVariant
entry.description: Variant of the Scanning Sequence

entry.name: ScanOptions
entry.description: Parameters of scanning sequence

entry.name: MRAcquisitionType
entry.description: Identification of date encoding scheme. Enumerated Values: 2D = frequency x phase 3D = frequency x phase x phase

entry.name: SequenceName
entry.description: User defined name for the Scanning Sequence and Sequence Variant combination

entry.name: AngioFlag
entry.description: Angio image indicator. Primary image for angio processing. Enumerated values: Y = image is Angio N = image is not Angio

entry.name: RepetitionTime
entry.description: The period of time in msec between the beginning of a pulse sequence and the beginning of a succeeding (essentially identical) pulse sequence. Required except when Scanning Sequence is EP and Sequence Variant is not segmented k-space

entry.name: EchoTime
entry.description: Time in msec between the middle of the excitation pulse and the peak of the echo produced. In the case of segmented k-space, the TE(eff) is the time between the middle of the excitation pulse to the peak of the echo that is used to cover the center of k-space)

entry.name: InversionTime
entry.description: Time in msec after the middle of inverting RF pulse to middle of excitation pulse to detect the amount of longitudinal magnetization. Required if Scanning Sequence has value of IR

entry.name: NumberOfAverages
entry.description: Number of times a given pulse sequence is repeated before any parameter has changed

entry.name: ImagingFrequency
entry.description: Precession frquency in MHz of the nucleus being addressed

entry.name: ImagedNucleus
entry.description: Nucleus that is resonant at the imaging frequency

entry.name: EchoNumbers
entry.description: The echo number used in generating this image. In the case of segmented k-space, it is the effective Echo Number

entry.name: MagneticFieldStrength
entry.description: Nominal Field strength of MR magnet, in Tesla

entry.name: SpacingBetweenSlices
entry.description: Spacing between slices, in mm. The spacing is measured from the center-to-center of each slice

entry.name: NumberOfPhaseEncodingSteps
entry.description: Total number of lines in k-space in the y-direction collecting during acquisition

entry.name: EchoTrainLength
entry.description: Number of lines in k-space acquired per excitation per image

entry.name: PercentSampling
entry.description: Fraction of acquisition matrix lines acquired, expressed as a percent

entry.name: PercentPhaseFieldOfView
entry.description: Ration of field of view dimension in phase direction to field of view dimension in frequency direction, expressed as a percent

entry.name: PixelBandwidth
entry.description: Reciprocal of the total sampling period, in hertz per pixel

entry.name: BeatRejectionFlag
entry.description: Beat length sorting has been applied. Enumerated values: Y = yes N = no

entry.name: Low R-R Value
entry.description: R-R interval low limit for beat rejection, in msec

entry.name: High R-R Value
entry.description: R-R interval high limit for beat rejection, in msec

entry.name: TriggerTime
entry.description: Time, in msec, between peak of the R wave and the peak of the echo produced. In the case of segmented k-space, the TE(eff) is the time between the peak of the echo that is used to cover the center of k-space. Required for Scan Options which include heart gating

entry.name: NominalInterval
entry.description: Average R-R interval used for the scans, in msec

entry.name: IntervalsAcquired
entry.description: Number of R-R intervals acquired

entry.name: IntervalsRejected
entry.description: Number of R-R intervals rejected

entry.name: PVC Rejection
entry.description: Description of type of PVC rejection criteria used

entry.name: Skip Beats
entry.description: Number of beats skipped after a detected arrhythmia

entry.name: HeartRate
entry.description: Beats per minute

entry.name: CardiacNumberOfImages
entry.description: Number of imagesb per cardiac cycle

entry.name: TriggerWindow
entry.description: Percent of R-R interval, based on Heart Rate (0018,1088), prescribed as a window for a valid/usable trigger

entry.name: ReconstructionDiameter
entry.description: Diameter in mm of the region from within which data were used in creating the reconstruction of the image. Data may exist outside this region and portions of the patient may exist outside the region

entry.name: Receive Coil
entry.description: Received coil used

entry.name: TransmittingCoil
entry.description: Transmitted coil used

entry.name: AcquisitionMatrix
entry.description: Dimension of acquired frequency/phase data before reconstruction. Multi-valued: frequency rows/frequency columns/phase rows/phase columns

entry.name: PhaseEncodingDirection
entry.description: The axis of phase encoding with respect to the image. Enumerated Values: ROW = phase encoded in rows COL = phase encoded in columns

entry.name: FlipAngle
entry.description: Steady state angle in degrees to which the magnetic vector is flipped from the magnetic vector to the primary field

entry.name: VariableFlipAngleFlag
entry.description: Flip angle variation applied during image acquisition. Enumerated Values: Y = yes N = no

entry.name: SAR
entry.description: Calculated whole body specific absortion rate in watts/kilogram

entry.name: dbdt
entry.description: The rate of change of the gradient coil magnetic flux density with time (T/s)

entry.name: ContrastBolusAgent
entry.description: Contrast or bolus agent

entry.name: ContrastBolusStartTime
entry.description: Time of start of injection

entry.name: ContrastBolusStopTime
entry.description: Time of end of contrast injection

entry.name: ContrastBolusTotalDose
entry.description: Total amount in milliliters of the indiluted contrast agent

entry.name: Contrast Flow Rate(s)
entry.description: Rate(s) of injection(s) in millilitres/sec

entry.name: ContrastBolusVolume
entry.description: Volume injected in milliliters of diluted contrast agent

entry.name: ContrastFlowDurations
entry.description: Duration(s) of injection(s) in seconds. Each Contrast Flow Duration value shall correspond to a value of Contrast Flow Rate (0018,1046)

entry.name: Contrast/Bolus Ingredient
entry.description: Active ingredient of agent, Defined Terms: IODINE, GADOLIMIUM, CARBON DIOXIDE, BARIUM

entry.name: Contrast/Bolus Ingredient Concentration
entry.description: Milligrams of active ingredient per milliliter of (diluted) agent

entry.name: SamplesPerPixel
entry.description: Number of samples (planes) in this image

entry.name: PhotometricInterpretation
entry.description: Specifies the intended interpretation of the pixel data

entry.name: Rows
entry.description: Number of rows in the image

entry.name: Columns
entry.description: Number of columns in the image

entry.name: PixelAspectRatio
entry.description: Ratio of the vertical size and horizontal size of the pixels in the image specified by a pair of integer values where the first value is the vertical pixel size, and the second value is the horizontal pixel size. Required if the aspect ratio is not 1/1 and the Image Plane Module is not applicable to this Image

entry.name: BitsAllocated
entry.description: Number of bits allocated for each pixel sample. Each sample shall have the same number of bits allocated

entry.name: BitsStored
entry.description: Number of bits stored for each pixel sample. Each sample shall have the same number of bits stored

entry.name: HighBit
entry.description: Most significant bit for pixel sample data. Each sample shall have the same high bit

entry.name: PixelRepresentation
entry.description: Data representation of the pixel samples. Each sample shall have the same pixel representation. Enumerated values: 0000H = unsigned integer. 0001H = 2's complement.

entry.name: PixelData
entry.description: A data stream of the pixel samples which comprises the image

entry.name: Smallest Image Pixel Value
entry.description: The minimum actual pixel value encountered in this image

entry.name: Largest Image Pixel Value
entry.description: The maximum actual pixel value encountered in this image

entry.name: SliceThickness
entry.description: Nominal slice thickness, in mm

entry.name: ImageOrientationPatient
entry.description: The direction cosines of the first row and the first column with respect to the patient

entry.name: ImagePositionPatient
entry.description: The x,y and z coordinates of the upper left and hand corner (first pixel transmitted) of the image, in mm

entry.name: SliceLocation
entry.description: Relative position of exposure expressed in mm

entry.name: PixelSpacing
entry.description: Physical distance in the patient between the center of each pixel, specified by a numeric pair-adjacent row spacing (delimiter) adjacent column spacing in mm

entry.name: WindowCenter
entry.description: Window center

entry.name: WindowWidth
entry.description: Window width

entry.name: WindowCenterWidthExplanation
entry.description: Free form explanation of the meaning of the Window Center and Width. Multiple values correspond to multiple Window Center and Width values

entry.name: Manufacturer
entry.description: Manufacturer of the equipment that produced the digital images

entry.name: InstitutionName
entry.description: Institution where the equipment is located that produced the digital images

entry.name: InstitutionAddress
entry.description: Mailing address of the institution where the equipment is located that produced the digital images

entry.name: ManufacturersModelName
entry.description: Manufacturer's model number of the equipment that produced the digital images

entry.name: DeviceSerialNumber
entry.description: Manufacturer's serial number of the equipment that produced the digital images

entry.name: SoftwareVersions
entry.description: Manufacturer's designation of software of the equipment that produced the digital images

entry.name: OverlayRows
entry.description: Number of Rows in Overlay

entry.name: OverlayColumns
entry.description: Number of Columns in Overlay

entry.name: OverlayType
entry.description: Indicates whether this overlay represents a region of interest or other graphics

entry.name: Overlay Origin
entry.description: Location of first overlay point with respect to pixel in the image, given as row/column

entry.name: OverlayBitsAllocated
entry.description: Number of bits allocated in the overlay

entry.name: OverlayBitPosition
entry.description: Bit in which overlay is stored

entry.name: Overlay Data
entry.description: Overlay pixel data

entry.name: HeaderType
entry.description: Medcom header characteristics. Defined Terms: MEDCOM 1

entry.name: HeaderVersion
entry.description: Version of Medcom header

entry.name: HeaderInfo
entry.description: Manufacturer header info

entry.name: HistoryInfo
entry.description: Patient registration history

entry.name: EchoLinePosition
entry.description: Fourier line position with the maximal echo for the performed acquisition

entry.name: EchoColumnPosition
entry.description: Echo column position for the performed acquisition

entry.name: EchoPartitionPosition
entry.description: Echo partition position for the performed acquisition

entry.name: UsedChannelMask
entry.description: 8 bit mask of the used receiver channels for the performed acquisition. Example: channel 0: 00000001 channel 3: 00000111

entry.name: Actual3DImaPartNumber
entry.description: Number of a 3D partitions beginning with 0

entry.name: ICE_Dims
entry.description: The 9 used ICE object dimensions of the performed acquisition. Combined/unset dimensions will be marked with 'X'. E.g.: X_2_1_1_1_1_2_1_1

entry.name: B_value
entry.description: Diffusion effect in s/mm*mm of the ICE program for the performed acquisition

entry.name: Filter1
entry.description: Context vision filter

entry.name: Filter2
entry.description: not used

entry.name: ProtocolSliceNumber
entry.description: Number of the slice beginning with 0

entry.name: RealDwellTime
entry.description: The time in ns between the beginning of sampling one data point and the beginning of sampling of next data point in the acquired signal. This means the dwell time is the sampling rate during digital conversion of an acquired signal

entry.name: PixelFile
entry.description: Used raw data file for the performed acquisition

entry.name: PixelFileName
entry.description: Used raw data file name for the performed acquisition

entry.name: SliceMeasurementDuration
entry.description: Time duration between two slices of the performed acquisition

entry.name: AcquisitionMatrixText
entry.description: Used acquisition matrix description

entry.name: SequenceMask
entry.description: Parameters used for acquisition, e.g. door open, interpolation, raw filter, Siemens sequence ....

entry.name: MeasuredFourierLines
entry.description: Number of performed fourier lines

entry.name: FlowEncodingDirection
entry.description: Flow encoding direction

entry.name: FlowVenc
entry.description: Flow Quant attribute

entry.name: PhaseEncodingDirectionPositive
entry.description: Phase encoding direction: 0 = negative; 1 = positive

entry.name: NumberOfImagesInMosaic
entry.description: Number of slices in a mosaic image

entry.name: DiffusionGradientDirection
entry.description: Diffusion in gradient direction

entry.name: ImageGroup
entry.description: Group of images

entry.name: SliceNormalVector
entry.description: X,y and z normal vector of the slices

entry.name: DiffusionDirection
entry.description: Diffusion direction

entry.name: TimeAfterStart
entry.description: Time delay after start of measurement

entry.name: FlipAngle
entry.description: Flip angle for SC images

entry.name: SequenceName
entry.description: Sequence name for SC images

entry.name: RepetitionTime
entry.description: Repetition time for SC images

entry.name: EchoTime
entry.description: Echo time for SC images

entry.name: NumberOfAverages
entry.description: Number of averages for SC images

entry.name: NonimageType
entry.description: Data identification characteristics. Defined terms: RAW DATA NUM 4; SPEC NUM4

entry.name: NonimageVersion
entry.description: Version of Non-image data

entry.name: NonimageInfo
entry.description: Description of Non-image data

entry.name: NonimageData
entry.description: Binary data stream

entry.name: ImageType
entry.description: Image identification characteristics

entry.name: AcquisitionDate
entry.description: The date the acquisition of data started

entry.name: AcquisitionTime
entry.description: The time the acquisition of data started

entry.name: DerivationDescription
entry.description: A text description of how this data set was derived

entry.name: AcquisitionNumber
entry.description: A number identifying the gathering of data over a period of time which resulted in this data set

entry.name: ImageNumber
entry.description: A number that identifies this image

entry.name: ImageComments
entry.description: User-defined comments about the image

entry.name: ReferencedImageSequence
entry.description: A sequence which provides reference to a set of Image SOP Class/Instance identifying other images significantly related to this image (localizer images)

entry.name: PatientOrientation
entry.description: Patient direction of the rows and columns of the image. Not required for MR images

entry.name: ScanningSequence
entry.description: Description of the type of data taken. Enumerated values: SE = Spin Echo; IR = Inversion Recovery; GR = Gradient Recalled; EP = Echo Planar; RM = Research Mode

entry.name: SequenceName
entry.description: User defined name for the Scanning Sequence and Sequence Variant combination

entry.name: RepetitionTime
entry.description: The period of time in msec between the beginning of a pulse sequence and the beginning of a succeeding (essentially identical) pulse sequence. Required except when Scanning Sequence is EP and Sequence Variant is not segmented k-space

entry.name: EchoTime
entry.description: Time in msec between the middle of the excitation pulse and the peak of the echo produced. In the case of segmented k-space, the TE(eff) is the time between the middle of the excitation pulse to the peak of the echo that is used to cover the center of k-space)

entry.name: InversionTime
entry.description: Time in msec after the middle of inverting RF pulse to middle of excitation pulse to detect the amount of longitudinal magnetization. Required if Scanning Sequence has value of IR

entry.name: NumberOfAverages
entry.description: Number of averages

entry.name: ImagingFrequency
entry.description: Precession frquency in MHz of the nucleus being addressed

entry.name: ImagedNucleus
entry.description: Nucleus that is resonant at the imaging frequency

entry.name: EchoNumbers
entry.description: The echo number used in generating this image. In the case of segmented k-space, it is the effective Echo Number

entry.name: MagneticFieldStrength
entry.description: Nominal Field strength of MR magnet, in Tesla

entry.name: NumberOfPhaseEncodingSteps
entry.description: Total number of lines in k-space in the y-direction collecting during acquisition

entry.name: EchoTrainLength
entry.description: Number of lines in k-space acquired per excitation per image

entry.name: PercentSampling
entry.description: Fraction of acquisition matrix lines acquired, expressed as a percent

entry.name: PercentPhaseFieldOfView
entry.description: Ration of field of view dimension in phase direction to field of view dimension in frequency direction, expressed as a percent

entry.name: TriggerTime
entry.description: Time, in msec, between peak of the R wave and the peak of the echo produced. In the case of segmented k-space, the TE(eff) is the time between the peak of the echo that is used to cover the center of k-space. Required for Scan Options which include heart gating

entry.name: ReceivingCoil
entry.description: Received coil used

entry.name: TransmittingColi
entry.description: Transmitted coil used

entry.name: AcquisitionMatrixText
entry.description: Dimension of acquired frequency/phase data before reconstruction. Multi-valued: frequency rows/frequency columns/phase rows/phase columns

entry.name: PhaseEncodingDirection
entry.description: The axis of phase encoding with respect to the image. Enumerated Values: ROW = phase encoded in rows COL = phase encoded in columns

entry.name: FlipAngle
entry.description: Steady state angle in degrees to which the magnetic vector is flipped from the magnetic vector to the primary field

entry.name: VariableFlipAngleFlag
entry.description: Flip angle variation applied during image acquisition. Enumerated Values: Y = yes N = no

entry.name: SAR
entry.description: Calculated whole body specific absortion rate in watts/kilogram

entry.name: dBdt
entry.description: The rate of change of the gradient coil magnetic flux density with time (T/s)

entry.name: Rows
entry.description: Number of rows in the image

entry.name: Columns
entry.description: Number of columns in the image

entry.name: SliceThickness
entry.description: Nominal slice thickness, in mm

entry.name: ImagePositionPatient
entry.description: The direction cosines of the first row and the first column with respect to the patient

entry.name: ImageOrientationPatient
entry.description: The x,y and z coordinates of the upper left and hand corner (first pixel transmitted) of the image, in mm.

entry.name: SliceLocation
entry.description: Relative position of exposure expressed in mm

entry.name: EchoLinePosition
entry.description: Fourier line position with the maximal echo for the performed acquisition

entry.name: EchoColumnPosition
entry.description: Echo column position for the performed acquisition

entry.name: EchoPartitionPosition
entry.description: Echo partition position for the performed acquisition

entry.name: Actual3DImaPartNumber
entry.description: Number of a 3D partitions beginning with 0

entry.name: RealDwellTime
entry.description: The time in ns between the beginning of sampling one data point and the beginning of sampling of next data point in the acquired signal. This means the dwell time is the sampling rate during digital conversion of an acquired signal

entry.name: ProtocolSliceNumber
entry.description: Number of the slice beginning with 0

entry.name: PixelFile
entry.description: Used raw data file for the performed acquisition

entry.name: PixelFileName
entry.description: Used raw data file name for the performed acquisition

entry.name: ICE_Dims
entry.description: The 9 used ICE object dimensions of the performed acquisition. Combined/unset dimensions will be marked with 'X'. E.g.: X_2_1_1_1_1_2_1_1

entry.name: PixelSpacing
entry.description: Physical distance in the patient between the center of each pixel, specified by a numeric pair-adjacent row spacing (delimiter) adjacent column spacing in mm

entry.name: SourceImageSequence
entry.description: A sequence which identifies the set of Image SOP Class/Instance pairs of the images which were use to derive this image

entry.name: PixelBandwidth
entry.description: Reciprocal of the total sampling period, in hertz per pixel

entry.name: SliceMeasurementDuration
entry.description: Time duration between two slices of the performed acquisition

entry.name: SequenceMask
entry.description: Parameters used for acquisition, e.g. door open, interpolation, raw filter, Siemens sequence .·

entry.name: AcquisitionMatrixText
entry.description: Used acquisition matrix description

entry.name: MeasuredFourierLines
entry.description: Number of performed fourier lines

entry.name: ulVersion
entry.description: Protocol version

entry.name: tSequenceFileName
entry.description: Sequence file name for actual measurement protocol

entry.name: tProtocolName
entry.description: Name of actual measurement protocol

entry.name: tReferenceImage0
entry.description: Referenced image

entry.name: tReferenceImage1
entry.description: Referenced image

entry.name: tReferenceImage2
entry.description: Referenced image

entry.name: lScanRegionPosSag
entry.description: Desired table position in series block coordinate system

entry.name: lScanRegionPosCor
entry.description: Desired table position in series block coordinate system

entry.name: lScanRegionPosTra
entry.description: Desired table position in series block coordinate system

entry.name: ucScanRegionPosValid
entry.description: Valid flag for desired table position in series block coordinate system

entry.name: lScanRegionDelta
entry.description: Scan Region Position/Move [mm]

entry.name: sProtConsistencyInfo.tBaselineString
entry.description: Baseline consistence info

entry.name: sProtConsistencyInfo.tGradCoilName
entry.description: Coil name consistence info

entry.name: sProtConsistencyInfo.tGradAmplifierName
entry.description: Gradient amplifier consistence info

entry.name: sProtConsistencyInfo.flNominalB0
entry.description: Nominal Bo compensation consistence

entry.name: sGRADSPEC.sEddyCompensationX.aflAmplitude
entry.description: Eddy compensation x amplitude gradient system specification

entry.name: sGRADSPEC.sEddyCompensationX.aflTimeConstant
entry.description: Eddy compensation x time parameter gradient system specification

entry.name: sGRADSPEC.sEddyCompensationY.aflAmplitude
entry.description: Eddy compensation y amplitude gradient system specification

entry.name: sGRADSPEC.sEddyCompensationY.aflTimeConstant
entry.description: Eddy compensation y time parameter gradient system specification

entry.name: sGRADSPEC.sEddyCompensationZ.aflAmplitude
entry.description: Eddy compensation z amplitude gradient system specification

entry.name: sGRADSPEC.sEddyCompensationZ.aflTimeConstant
entry.description: Eddy compensation z time parameter gradient system specification

entry.name: sGRADSPEC.bB0CompensationValid
entry.description: B0 compensation gradient system specification valid flag

entry.name: sGRADSPEC.sCrossTermCompensationXY.aflAmplitude
entry.description: Crossterm compensation xy amplitude gradient system specification

entry.name: sGRADSPEC.sCrossTermCompensationZY.aflTimeConstant
entry.description: Crossterm compensation zy time parameter gradient system specification

entry.name: sGRADSPEC.bCrossTermCompensationValid
entry.description: Crossterm compensation gradient system specification valid flag

entry.name: sGRADSPEC.lOffsetX
entry.description: Gradient offset x direction [bit pattern]

entry.name: sGRADSPEC.lOffsetY
entry.description: Gradient offset y direction [bit pattern]

entry.name: sGRADSPEC.lOffsetZ
entry.description: Gradient offset z direction [bit pattern]

entry.name: sGRADSPEC.bOffsetValid
entry.description: Gradient offsets valid flag

entry.name: sGRADSPEC.lDelayX
entry.description: Gradient delay x direction

entry.name: sGRADSPEC.lDelayY
entry.description: Gradient delay y direction

entry.name: sGRADSPEC.lDelayY
entry.description: Gradient delay z direction

entry.name: sGRADSPEC.bDelayValid
entry.description: Gradient delay valid flag

entry.name: sGRADSPEC.flSensitivityX
entry.description: Gradient sensitivity x direction [mT/m]

entry.name: sGRADSPEC.flSensitivityY
entry.description: Gradient sensitivity y direction [mT/m]

entry.name: sGRADSPEC.flSensitivityZ
entry.description: Gradient sensitivity z direction [mT/m]

entry.name: sGRADSPEC.bSensitivityValid
entry.description: Gradient sensitivity valid flag

entry.name: sGRADSPEC.flGSWDMinRiseTime
entry.description: Minimum gradient rise time for mode GRAD_GSWD_RISETIME

entry.name: sGRADSPEC.alShimCurrent
entry.description: Shim current parameter [mA]

entry.name: sGRADSPEC.bShimCurrentValid
entry.description: Shim current parameter valid flag

entry.name: sGRADSPEC.ucMode
entry.description: Gradient mode: fast, normal, whisper

entry.name: sTXSPEC.asNucleusInfo[0].tNucleus
entry.description: Transmitter system nucleus

entry.name: sTXSPEC.asNucleusInfo[0].lFrequency
entry.description: Transmitter system frequency [Hz]

entry.name: sTXSPEC.asNucleusInfo[0].bFrequencyValid
entry.description: Frequency valid flag

entry.name: sTXSPEC.asNucleusInfo[0].lDeltaFrequency
entry.description: Offset from center frequency (lFrequency)

entry.name: sTXSPEC.asNucleusInfo[0].flReferenceAmplitude
entry.description: Transmitter reference amplitude [V]

entry.name: sTXSPEC.asNucleusInfo[0].bReferenceAmplitudeValid
entry.description: Reference amplitude valid flag

entry.name: sTXSPEC.asNucleusInfo[0].flAmplitudeCorrection
entry.description: Transmitter amplitude correction factor, e.g. used for water suppression

entry.name: sTXSPEC.asNucleusInfo[0].bAmplitudeCorrectionValid
entry.description: Amplitude correction valid flag
